title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 20061, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20082, Regulation (EU) 
No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20123 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 20194.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20061 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20082 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20123 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20194

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature 
of which is specified in the Schedule in relation to each year in the period 
from 2019 to 2023, is hereby prescribed. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L. 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

[650] 3 

Article 4
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking order applies provide purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation year period 2019 2023 hereby prescribed 1 oj no l 393 30.12.2006 p 1 2 oj no l 97 9.4.2008 p 13 3 oj no l 32 3.2.2012 p 1 4 oj no l 198 25.7.2019 p 241 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st january 2021 schedule 650 3 article 4

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
1. 
Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the 
information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the quantity of coniferous roundwood from publicly-owned and 
privately-owned forests in the State purchased by, and delivered 
to the premises of, the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-coniferous roundwood from publicly-owned 
and privately-owned forests in the State purchased by, and 
delivered to the premises of, the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-roundwood products purchased by, and 
delivered to the premises of, the undertaking from undertakings 
in the State.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates business activity undertaking concerned specifying year information relates (a) (b) (c) quantity coniferous roundwood publicly-owned privately-owned forest state purchased delivered premise undertaking quantity non-coniferous roundwood publicly-owned privately-owned forest state purchased delivered premise undertaking quantity non-roundwood product purchased delivered premise undertaking undertaking state

2. 
Information on the time taken by the undertaking to complete the 
questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 17 December 2020 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach.
